name: Lean Canvas Template
description:
For what?

The vast & most widespread mistake for any company is creating a product that nobody needs. Lean Canvas model helps you capture everything uncertain about your idea. It has the structure and key points that you must consider when launching. And as a result, you can create a clear roadmap.


What is a Lean Canvas?

Lean Canvas is an adapted version of the Business Canvas model by Alex Osterwalder. The fundamental difference â€” Lean Canvas is more focused on startups. It helps you turn your killer idea into life. When you fill in Lean Canvas, try to be as specific as possible. Every detail matters.
